```{r}

korean_df %>%
  filter(str_detect(cuisine_description, "Korean")) %>%
  mutate(boro = fct_infreq(boro)) %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~boro, y = ~grade, color = ~grade, type = "histogram", colors =   "viridis") %>%
  layout(title = "Distribution of grade by boroughs", xaxis = list(title ="Borough"), yaxis = list(title="Count"))
```
